mapper.sql: a.id, a.name, a.parent_id as "parentId", a.parent_ids as "parentIds", a.available, a.remarks, a.create_date as "createDate", a.update_date as "updateDate", a.status as "status", b.id as "organization.id", b.name as "organization.name", b.parent_id as "organization.parentId", b.parent_ids as "organization.parentIds"
LEFT JOIN sys_organization b ON b.id = a.parent_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_organization a
where a.status='0' and (a.parent_ids like '${user.organization.parentIds}${user.organization.id}/%' or a.id=#{user.organization.id})
mapper.delete: update sys_organization set status='1' where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM sys_organization a WHERE a.parent_id=#{id}
